entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who is moving around the trophy room on the floor above Gryffindor Tower.

entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: Gryffindor Tower is a location in Hogwarts where Harry had taken his first step back towards.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is observing Peeves and Bartemius Crouch on the map.

entities.name: snape's office
entities.description: Snape's office is a location in Hogwarts where a single dot was flitting around.

entities.name: bartemius crouch
entities.description: Bartemius Crouch is a character who is supposed to be too ill to go to work or come to the Yule Ball, but is sneaking into Hogwarts at one o'clock in the morning.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school where Harry and other characters are attending.

entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: The Yule Ball is an event that Bartemius Crouch is supposed to attend.

relationships.description: Harry is observing Peeves moving around the trophy room.
Harry is suspicious of Bartemius Crouch sneaking into Hogwarts at one o'clock in the morning.
Peeves is moving around the trophy room on the floor above Gryffindor Tower.
Bartemius Crouch is present in Snape's office.
Harry is attending Hogwarts where Bartemius Crouch is sneaking into.
Bartemius Crouch is supposed to attend the Yule Ball.
